attributes.description: 1 Owner Full Service History with Nissan, Balance of Warranty and Service Plan still active.101 Multi-Point check Accident free Trade-ins accepted Finance can be arranged Excludes administration, delivery and license registration fees At BB Nissan Hatfield we believe in Customer Satisfaction and providing an Exclusive Service that will always exceed your expectations.
